title: What is going to happen with Carolina Beach Rd that will take until Nov. 2017 to complete as per the sign on College Rd. at Monkey Junction?
text: The N.C. Department of Transportation is widening and creating new turning lanes for a 9-mile stretch of Carolina Beach Road. Read more here: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20151014/ARTICLES/151019874/
